[[File:ShinyStone.png|thumb|200px|The Shiny Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Shiny Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Solaceon Town]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Togetic.png|40px]] Togetic || [[File:Togekiss.png|40px]] Togekiss |- | [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] Roselia || [[File:Roserade.png|40px]] Roserade |- | [[File:Minccino.png|40px]] Minccino || [[File:Cinccino.png|40px]] Cinccino |}
